summary: "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood" is a 2019 movie by Quentin Tarantino about a struggling actor and his stunt double in 1969 Los Angeles. They face a changing movie industry and the danger of the Tate murders. The film stars Leonardo DiCaprio and Brad Pitt. It was well-received, making over $374 million and winning two Oscars. Tarantino wrote a book based on the movie in 2021. This was Tarantino's first film without the Weinstein brothers, following the sexual abuse allegations against them.
title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
